it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view

Class TextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view.View
      • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.view.TextView

  • public class TextView
extends View
    Class that manages and control the Text User Interface

    Creates different text lines to describe the game flow and analyze and manage the user inputs in response to the different game calls

      • discardManager

        public int discardManager(java.lang.String objects,
                          boolean withUse)
        Manages the user selection about which item card discard via text input
        Parameters:
        objects - the currently owned item cards coded as a String
        withUse - if the player is human, signals that a "use now" button listener must be added
        Returns:
        the index of the item card chosen
